title: Where can I find good bhojpuri songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Bidesia Project is a non-profit initiative that aims to conserve Bhojpuri folk culture by archiving, reviving and promoting oral music traditions. You can check out Bhojpuri folk songs here: TheBidesiaProject

If u are talking about lyrics than sorry friend you will find nothing in the songs releasing presently or had been released in around 5 years.Still there is a song from Rajneeti(bollywood) movie "Mora Piya" which is quite in bhojpuri and will please your ears :)
